contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Drogenbos |picture= |picture-legend= |map=DrogenbosLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Drogenbos in Flemish Brabant |arms=Wapen van Drogenbos.svg |flag=Flag of Drogenbos.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-VB}} |arrondissement=[[Halle-Vilvoorde administrative Arrondissement|Halle-Vilvoorde]] |nis=23098 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Alexis Calmeyn (Drogenbos Plus) |majority=Drogenbos Plus |postal-codes=1620 |telephone-area=02 |web=[http://www.drogenbos.be/ www.drogenbos.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=47 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=19 }} '''Drogenbos''' {{Audio|Nl-Drogenbos.ogg|(listen)}} is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Flemish Brabant]]. The municipality only comprises the town of Drogenbos proper. On January 1, 2006 Drogenbos had a total population of 4,876. The total area is 2.49 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 1,957 inhabitants per km². The official language of Drogenbos is [[Dutch language|Dutch]], as everywhere in [[Flanders]]. Local French-speakers enjoy [[Municipalities with linguistic facilities|linguistic facilities]]. ==Famous inhabitants== * [[Joseph Loeckx]], [[Franco-Belgian comics|comic]] artist, pseudonym Jo-El Azara * [[Charles Theodore, Elector of Bavaria]], Duke of [[Bavaria]] * [[Felix De Boeck]], (1898 - 1995), painter. A [http://www.mufdb.org museum] has been opened in 1995 with the work of Felix De Boeck. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.drogenbos.be Official website ] - Information available in [[Dutch language|Dutch]] and [[French language|French]] {{Flemish Brabant}} [[Category:Municipalities of Flemish Brabant]] {{FlemishBrabant-geo-stub}}
